title: AFL: I'd like to see that [advertisement] 1994
brief_description: Produced in 1994 to promote Australian Rules Football as a national game, this ad features international sportspeople Evander Holyfeld (boxer), Hakeem ‘The Dream’ Olajuwon (basketball player), Carl Lewis (runner), Sharron Davies (swimmer), John McEnroe (tennis player), Dean Richards (rugby player) and Ian Wright (soccer player). Produced by Campaign Palace.
